profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Lead Website Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in front-end development utilizing **JavaScript**, and I'm well-versed in leveraging AI SEO tooling to enhance website performance. My strong communication and collaboration skills allow me to effectively lead teams and mentor junior developers. I have expertise in designing user-friendly CMS interfaces and implementing algorithms that improve SEO metrics.
My background includes developing high-performance solutions in various sectors, including healthcare and finance, using a robust tech stack of **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. With a solid understanding of cloud services such as **Azure** and **AWS**, I implement CI/CD automation to ensure efficient deployment processes. Additionally, my experience with machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows enhances my ability to incorporate intelligent automation into various projects.
